channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voiture électrique chinoise : l’astuce de Deepal pour échapper totalement aux taxes de l’Europe
item.description: Bientôt commercialisé en Europe, le Deepal S05 ne devrait pas être soumis aux droits de douane chez nous. Mais comment cela est-il possible pour la voiture électrique chinoise ? On vous explique tout !

item.title: How to watch the LG CES 2026 press conference
item.description: LG For years, LG has kicked off CES press day with the first event of the morning — and 2026 will be no different. The Korea-based corporation is theming its presentation as "Innovation in Tune with You," and — if it follows the template of past presentations — it will highlight both the consumer electronics and large appliance sides of its mammoth global businesses. Like nearly all tech-centric events these days, expect AI to be the binding theme of the LG presentation at CES 2026. Just be aware that, like Apple, LG has its own customized abbreviation for AI: "Affectionate Intelligence." The...

item.title: 2025 was the year AI got a vibe check
item.description: AI’s early-2025 spending spree featured massive raises and trillion-dollar infrastructure promises. By year’s end, hype gave way to a vibe check, with growing scrutiny over sustainability, safety, and business models.

item.title: 5 of the best free movies to stream on Tubi, Pluto TV, Samsung TV Plus, and more this week (December 29)
item.description: There's action movies, horrors and more to stream this week. And the best part is, they're all completely free.

item.description: Details have been clarified by a Microsoft engineer.

item.title: GOG’s Steam-alternative PC game store is leaving CD Projekt, staying DRM-free
item.description: GOG is splitting from CD Projekt, the game company that launched the preservation-focused PC gaming marketplace in 2008. In an update on Monday, GOG announced that its co-founder, Michał Kiciński, has acquired the digital storefront and its online gaming platform GOG Galaxy from CD Projekt - which he also co-founded - for $25.2 million. The […]

item.title: Give your pup a fresh start in 2026 with The Farmer’s Dog
item.description: Get 50% off your first box of human-grade pet food from The Farmer's Dog.

item.title: 15 Things We Liked, and 5 We Didn’t, About ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5, Volume 2
item.description: The final battle begins December 31—but first, we have praise and a few nitpicks to pass along to Netflix and the Duffer Brothers.

item.title: China’s Trying to Give the Digital Yuan a Boost in 2026
item.description: While China has been ahead of the game when it comes to government-backed digital currencies, adoption has been slow.

item.title: Study reveals just how much AI slop is on YouTube
item.description: New research shows YouTube’s algorithm is heavily promoting low-quality AI-generated and “brainrot” videos, making up a large share of what new users see.

item.title: Plaud Note Pro is an excellent AI-powered recorder that I carry everywhere

item.title: Philips Hue Essential lights are spectacular value, but the originals outshine them in one key way
item.description: Hue Essential bulbs are just as good as the originals in most situations, provided you don't need to dial the brightness right down.

item.title: Wall Street cools after tech rally as 2025 comes to an end
item.description: Stocks pulled back after the S&P 500 was in the 1% range of the 7,000-point mark, and the blue-chip Dow hit a record closing high last week. Wall Street’s main indexes kicked off the final week of the year on a softer note on Monday, as heavyweight technology stocks retreated from last week’s gains that had pushed the S&P 500 to record highs.

item.title: Tesla will charge you $150 for puking or smoking in its robotaxis, report says
item.description: Make a mess in your Tesla robotaxi? That'll cost you.

item.title: Co-founder of CD Projekt Michał Kiciński has acquired GOG, the company's game storefront
item.description: Michał Kiciński, co-founder of CD Projekt, has acquired total ownership of the DRM-free video game storefront GOG. The digital video game platform was started by CD Projekt in 2008 with a stated mission to preserve "Good Old Games" (hence the GOG acronym). CD Projekt is known for its game studio CD Projekt Red, the developers The Witcher series and Cyberpunk 2077. GOG said Kiciński bought 100 percent of its shares for PLN 90.7 million ($25 million). The acquisition was fully financed through committed funding secured at the sale’s closing and did not involve the sale of any of Kiciński’s CD Pr...

item.title: A Solution to Satellite Pollution? Make Them Indestructible
item.description: Researchers suggest a sea change in satellite design to protect the ozone layer.

item.title: The OnePlus 15 earned a perfect score; here’s how the Galaxy S26 Ultra could also be a five-out-of-five
item.description: The next Galaxy S26 Ultra could be perfect, just like the OnePlus 15, if Samsung refines its software and refreshes the hardware with a new look. At the very least, it'll be improved if Samsung takes away some bloatware.

item.title: Yet another phishing campaign impersonates trusted Google services - here's what we know
item.description: Google Cloud Application Integration is being abused to generate phishing emails leading victims to fake Microsoft login sites.

item.title: Tackle tax season for less with this 30% off TurboTax deal
item.description: Get TurboTax Desktop Deluxe 2025 for $55.99 at Amazon. Features 375+ deductions, 5 federal e-files, and easy data import.

item.title: All 6 of the books that inspired "Heated Rivalry" are over half off at Amazon
item.description: All six titles in the "Game Changer" series by Rachel Reid are on sale in Kindle version at Amazon for $8.99 each, down from the normal print price of $18.99 each.

item.title: 2025 Was the Year Ninja Games Made a Comeback
item.description: With three 'Ninja Gaiden' games, 'Ghost of Yotei,' and 'Shinobi,' ninjas returned to the gaming forefront in a big way.

item.title: Turn your PC into a Super Nintendo with Epilogue’s new USB dock
item.description: After announcing and teasing its design well over a year ago, Epilogue's new SN Operator will finally be available for preorder starting tomorrow. Like the company's GB Operator that debuted in early 2021, the SN Operator is a standalone USB cartridge slot that lets you play and archive old Nintendo console games on PCs, Macs, […]
